```ts
«Sub» extends «Super» ? «TrueBranch» : «FalseBranch»

```

```ts
«Sub» extends «Super»
 ? «TrueBranch»
 : «FalseBranch»

```

```ts
type IsNumber<T> = T extends number ? true : false;
type _ = [
 Assert<Equal<
 IsNumber<123>, true
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 IsNumber<number>, true
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 IsNumber<'abc'>, false
 >>,
];

```

```ts
type PrimitiveTypeName<T> =
 T extends undefined ? 'undefined' :
 T extends null ? 'null' :
 T extends boolean ? 'boolean' :
 T extends number ? 'number' :
 T extends bigint ? 'bigint' :
 T extends string ? 'string' :
 never;

type _ = [
 Assert<Equal<
 PrimitiveTypeName<123n>,
 'bigint'
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 PrimitiveTypeName<bigint>,
 'bigint'
 >>,
];

```

```ts
type RemoveEmptyStrings<T extends Array<string>> =
 T extends [
 infer First extends string,
 ...infer Rest extends Array<string>
 ]
 ? First extends ''
 ? RemoveEmptyStrings<Rest>
 : [First, ...RemoveEmptyStrings<Rest>]
 : []
;
type _ = Assert<Equal<
 RemoveEmptyStrings<['', 'a', '', 'b', '']>,
 ["a", "b"]
>>;

```

```ts
type WrapLen<T> = T extends { length: number } ? Promise<T> : T;
type _ = [
 Assert<Equal<
 WrapLen<string>,
 Promise<string>
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 WrapLen<boolean>,
 boolean
 >>,
];

```

```ts
type WrapLen<T> = T extends { length: number } ? Promise<T> : T;
type _1 = Assert<Equal<
 WrapLen<'hello' | boolean | Array<number>>, // (A)
 Promise<'hello'> | boolean | Promise<Array<number>>
>>;

```

```ts
type _2 = [
 Assert<Equal<
 WrapLen<string>,
 Promise<string>
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 WrapLen<boolean>,
 boolean
 >>,
];

```

```ts
type Left<T> = T extends any ? Promise<T> : never;
type _ = Assert<Equal<
 Left<'a'|'b'>,
 Promise<'a'> | Promise<'b'>
>>;

```

```ts
type Right<T> = any extends T ? Promise<T> : never;
type _ = Assert<Equal<
 Right<'a'|'b'>,
 Promise<'a' | 'b'>
>>;

```

```ts
type IsTrue = false | true extends true ? 'yes' : 'no';
type _ = Assert<Equal<
 IsTrue,
 'no'
>>;

```

```ts
type IsTrue<T> = T extends true ? 'yes' : 'no';
type _ = Assert<Equal<
 IsTrue<false | true>,
 'no' | 'yes'
>>;

```

```ts
type IsString<T> = T extends string ? 'yes' : 'no';
type _ = [
 Assert<Equal<
 IsString<string>, 'yes'
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 IsString<number>, 'no'
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 IsString<string | number>, 'yes' | 'no' // (A)
 >>,
];

```

```ts
type IsString<T> = [T] extends [string] ? 'yes' : 'no';
type _ = [
 Assert<Equal<
 IsString<string>, 'yes'
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 IsString<number>, 'no'
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 IsString<string | number>, 'no'
 >>,
];

```

```ts
type AlwaysWrap<T> = T extends any ? [T] : never;
type _ = Assert<Equal<
 AlwaysWrap<boolean>,
 [false] | [true]
>>;

```

```ts
type AlwaysWrap<T> = true extends true ? [T] : never;
type _ = Assert<Equal<
 AlwaysWrap<boolean>,
 [boolean]
>>;

```

```ts
type _ = Assert<Equal<
 'a' | 'b' | never,
 'a' | 'b'
>>;

```

```ts
type DropNumber<T> = T extends number ? never : T;
type _ = Assert<Equal<
 DropNumber<1 | 'a' | 2 | 'b'>,
 'a' | 'b'
>>;

```

```ts
type KeepNumber<T> = T extends number ? T : never;

type _ = Assert<Equal<
 KeepNumber<1 | 'a' | 2 | 'b'>,
 1 | 2
>>;

```

```ts
/**
 * Exclude from T those types that are assignable to U
 */
type Exclude<T, U> = T extends U ? never : T;

type Union = 1 | 'a' | 2 | 'b';
type _ = [
 Assert<Equal<
 Exclude<Union, number>,
 'a' | 'b'
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 Exclude<Union, 1 | 'a' | 'x'>,
 2 | 'b'
 >>,
];

```

```ts
/**
 * Extract from T those types that are assignable to U
 */
type Extract<T, U> = T extends U ? T : never;

type Union = 1 | 'a' | 2 | 'b';
type _ = [
 Assert<Equal<
 Extract<Union, number>,
 1 | 2
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 Extract<Union, 1 | 'a' | 'x'>,
 1 | 'a'
 >>,
];

```

```ts
type IsUppercase<Str extends string> = Str extends Uppercase<Str>
 ? true
 : false;

type _ = [
 Assert<Equal<
 IsUppercase<'SUNSHINE'>, true
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 IsUppercase<'SUNSHINe'>, false
 >>,
];

```

```ts
type _ = [
 Assert<Equal<
 never extends true ? 'yes' : 'no',
 'yes'
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 never extends false ? 'yes' : 'no',
 'yes'
 >>,
];

```

```ts
type SimplifyTuple<Tup> =
 Tup extends [infer A, infer B]
 ? (Equal<A, B> extends true ? [A] : [A, B]) // (A)
 : never
;
type _ = [
 Assert<Equal<
 SimplifyTuple<['a', 'b']>,
 ['a', 'b']
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 SimplifyTuple<['a', 'a']>,
 ['a']
 >>,
];

```

```ts
X ? true
: Y ? true
: false

```

```ts
type ContainsNumber<Tup> =
 Tup extends [infer A, infer B]
 ? A extends number ? true
 : B extends number ? true
 : false
 : never
;
type _ = [
 Assert<Equal<
 ContainsNumber<['a', 'b']>,
 false
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 ContainsNumber<[1, 'a']>,
 true
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 ContainsNumber<[number, 'a']>,
 true
 >>,
];

```

```ts
export type TEqual<X, Y> =
 [IsAny<X>, IsAny<Y>] extends [true, true] ? true
 : [IsAny<X>, IsAny<Y>] extends [false, false] ? MutuallyAssignable<X, Y>
 : false

```
